block-definition.comment: substitute all occurrences of a letter or a sequence of letters in a text with another or none.

inputs.input: RedRed Green Blue Yellow Purple Cyan White Black

scripts.comment: LDR continuously reading LDR voltage and convert to resistance
calculate resistance of LDR Vo = 10K/(10K+LDR) * 3.3V LDR = (10K*3.3)/Vo - 10K
LDR calculate voltage measure from LDR
KY-018 Module Light Depedent Resistor (LDR) Fixed Resistance is 10K
KY-018 / pin connection S : analog output middle : +3.3V - : GND
